text.tspan: Mention of the word ‘capitalism’ in New York Times articles, 1851
Unit 1 'The capitalist revolution: prosperity, inequality, and planetary limits’ in The CORE Team, The Economy 2.0
Data source: Data by Simon de Deo (2016)
Note: Percent of New York Times articles in which the word 'capitalism' is mentioned. CC-BY-ND-NC
